name: PIERCING STRIKE
description: Deliver a powerful strike to your enemies and deal {minDamage}-{maxDamage} damage. Has a {missChance}% chance to miss.

start: With a firm grip, you prepare to unleash the full force of your {attack_name}.
You wind up your {attack_name}, ready to deliver a heavy blow that strikes with precision.
A sense of power surges through you as you raise your {attack_name}, preparing for a crushing strike.
Your muscles tense as you ready your {attack_name}, focusing all your strength into this mighty attack.
The air is thick with anticipation as you prepare to unleash a devastating {attack_name}.
hit: Your {attack_name} connects with force, dealing {damage} damage!
With a mighty swing, your {attack_name} lands, inflicting {damage} damage!
You strike with power, your {attack_name} landing with a heavy blow for {damage} damage!
The force of your {attack_name} lands with a thundering impact, causing {damage} damage!
Your {attack_name} crashes down, dealing {damage} damage with overwhelming force!
crit: A critical hit! Your {attack_name} lands with devastating impact, dealing {damage} damage!
The blow lands with immense force, your {attack_name} causing {damage} damage in a critical strike!
You unleash a powerful critical blow, your {attack_name} dealing {damage} damage!
Your {attack_name} strikes with unrelenting force, landing a critical hit for {damage} damage!
With unstoppable power, your {attack_name} lands a critical hit, causing {damage} damage!
miss: Your {attack_name} misses, the {enemy_name} narrowly avoiding your strike!
You swing too wide, and your {attack_name} fails to connect, missing the {enemy_name} entirely!
Your strike goes off target, and the {enemy_name} ducks under your {attack_name}!
The {enemy_name} sidesteps your {attack_name}, and it misses its mark!
Your swing falters, and the {enemy_name} evades your {attack_name}!
